# a\(n\) \= 4\*\(10^\(2n\+1\)\-1\)/9 \- 4\*10^n\.

```Maple
A332140 := n -> 4*((10^(2*n+1)-1)/9-10^n);
```


## Python
```Python
def A332140(n): return (10**(n*2+1)//9-10**n)*4
```
